title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk and linen needlework on linen foundation
Technique:  embroidery, deflected and withdrawn element work, and needle lace on plain weave foundation
description: Rectangular sampler with many small bands and squares of geometric patterns, in blues, greens, yellows, pinks and reds on white. The right side is dominated by two large areas of deflected element work in red and green.
name: Sampler
